DeploymentName.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid domain label matching /^([A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9-])+[A-Za-z0-9]$/

AllocateExternalIp.Description: Allocate External IP (eg for HA Proxy)

GenerateElbSslCertificate.Description: Generate AWS SSL certificate - requires manual intervention to validate request email

ElbSslCertificateArn.Description: Use pre-loaded SSL certificate - unless one is loaded or GenerateElbSslCertificate set to true an ELB will not be created
ElbSslCertificateArn.ConstraintDescription: AWS ACM SSL certificate ARN or NONE

HostedZone.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid domain name matching /^(([A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9-]?)+[A-Za-z0-9]\.)+([A-Za-z0-9]{2,}$/

DatabaseName.ConstraintDescription: Alphanumeric characters only and must start with a letter

DatabaseUsername.ConstraintDescription: Alphanumeric characters only and must start with a letter

DatabasePassword.ConstraintDescription: Can be any printable ASCII character except "/", """, or "@"

Organisation.ConstraintDescription: Can be any printable alphanumeric character, spaces or hypens

S3Buckets.Description: S3 Buckets - used during stack deletion
